title: 325btc
author: 325btc
content: In order to keep debt printing financial sustaibnle Here what coming next years get ready note that each crisis is bigger then previous.Covid it was....Monkeypox War Alien invasion yes project blue beam will be biggest crisis so get ready.Even war will be walk in the park comparing the alien invasion

comments.author: BADecker
comments.body: The alien invasion is almost entirely misunderstood by practically all people.Remember the 'I, Robot' movie and book? In the case of us people in our reality on earth, the people are the robots... super androids, really... with a world and life that can be wonderful, but is far more complex than most people want to believe.The alien invasion is really our creator, returning with his faithful robots/androids to clean up the mess we free androids are making of this island, earth.
